verses.name: Isaiah 10:4
verses.text: Without me they shall bow down under the prisoners, and they shall fall under the slain. For all this his anger is not turned away, but his hand is stretched out still.

verses.name: Isaiah 10:5
verses.text: O Assyrian, the rod of mine anger, and the staff in their hand is mine indignation.

verses.name: Isaiah 10:6
verses.text: I will send him against an hypocritical nation, and against the people of my wrath will I give him a charge, to take the spoil, and to take the prey, and to tread them down like the mire of the streets.
